title: hara mrtyunjaya
sahitya:
hara mrtyunjaya ambikA nAyakA hari kamalAsanAdyamara pUjitapAdA


anupallavi

  parama pAvana nAmA bhakta janA rAmA paripUrNa kAmA pAlita sOmA


caraNam    mAmava shankara madurAdhIshvarA mAdhava priyakara manOharA sharIrA
 kSEmakara shambhO shrIkaNTha vibhO jaya jaya harikEsha jaya citsabhEshA
